name: general usage info
info:
- this node sets its status to the LAST operation's outcome.
    Meaning it will stay the same unless another query is sent
-mysql errors are thrown as exceptions
-connection state is not shared.

name: max 10k leftshift
prepare log
all dbErrors
set global.mysql
func: //look into onStart tab

name: set global.functions
delay 4s->60m
on error -> queue and limit rate
info:
msg are queue in parallel, using timeouts.
rate is also limited, so the actual delay may exceed the timeout by
    rateTime * queueLength, growing without limits if inputs exceed rate.

name: max 10k leftshift
default: warn
func: node.warn({txt:"unhandled uibuilder msg.topic ",event:msg.topic,fullMsg:msg});

name: default: warn
func:
node.warn({txt:"unhandled uibuilder msg.type",topic:msg.type,fullMsg:msg});

global.get("utils").errorBlink(node,60000);

name: query last 2 hours
check success & format
default: warn
func: global.get("utils").errorBlink(node, 60000);

name: error
func:
node.error({txt:"missing _socketId",fullMsg:msg});

global.get("utils").errorBlink(node, 60000);

name: composeBigEndian
func:
msg.payload=(msg.payload[1]<<16) | msg.payload[0];
return msg;

name: composeLittleEndian
func:
msg.payload=(msg.payload[0]<<16) | msg.payload[1];
return msg;

name: testsToBeKept
func:

let a=1;
let a_plusPlus=context.a++;
let b = context.set("var")
node.warn({b:b,t:b===undefined});

else
